comment.author: 25308510@N08
comment._content: Per wikipedia, Baroness Maria (Mary) Vetsera was the mistress of Crown Prince Rudolf of the Austro-Hungarian empire. She was found dead along with him at the Mayerling hunting lodge. See the Mayerling Incident. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maria_Vetsera

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is Wikipedia account of the Mayerling Incident of 1889. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mayerling_Incident

comment._content: Foto muss vor 1889 aufgenommen worden sein (siehe www.mayerling.info)

comment._content: it cannot be from 1910 as she died in 1889

comment._content: If you look at her clothes I would think the picture was taken about 1888.
